DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , male female ( half male , half female ) ; Aged 18 40 year old ( bound include ) ; Nonsmoker ; BMI range 18.5 25 kg/m2 ( bound include ) Waist circumference ≤ 94 cm men ≤ 80 cm woman ; Stable body weight ( ± 1 kg ) 3 month precede experimental period ; Systolic blood pressure 95 145 mmHg diastolic blood pressure 50 85 mmHg ; For female subject : use oral contraceptive regular menstrual cycle ; Subject display identify significant metabolic impairment accord Principal Investigator ; Sedentary moderate physical activity ; Not give blood month prior selection accept give blood experimental period present study ; Regularly consume breakfast provide 15 % total daily energy intake , include least one cereal product ; adequate partitioning macronutrient intake ; Providing write consent his/her participation study ; Subject severe acute disease influence result study lifethreatening volunteer accord Principal Investigator ; Subject medical history symptomatic vascular disease ( infarct , angina pectoris , syndrome threat , surgery endovascular surgery , stroke , symptomatic peripheral arteritis ) accord investigator interfere result study constitute particular risk subject ; Subject type 1 type 2 diabetes ; Subject food allergy ; Subject eat disorder ( e.g . anorexia nervosa & bulimia ) accord Principal Investigator ; Subject regularly consume 20 g/day alcohol ; Subject regularly consume recreational drug ; Subject consume regularly corticoid , anorectic , adrenergic drug , gastric demulcent , cholesterol and/or lipid lower medication , weightloss drug drug supplement impact glucose metabolism Principal Investigator 's opinion ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Currently participate another study participate another study 3 month prior selection visit ; Consuming large amount food product naturally rich 13C .
